text: Time is long but life is short.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: Very superstitious, writings on the wall, very superstitious, ladders 'bout to fall, Thirteen month old baby, broke the lookin' glass, seven years of bad luck, the good things in your past.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love, and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: Just because a man lacks the use of his eyes doesn't mean he lacks vision.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: Exploitation, mutilation, mutations, confirmation to the evils of the world.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: Life has meaning only in the struggle. Triumph or defeat is in the hands of the Gods.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: Isn't she pretty . Truly the angel's best . Boy, I'm so happy . We have been heaven blessed . I can't believe what God has done . Through us he's given life to one . But isn't she lovely made from love.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: You took me riding in your rocket gave me a star.
author: Stevie Wonder

text: I just called to say I love you . I just called to say how much I care . I just called to say I love you .
author: Stevie Wonder

text: Music is a world within itself, with a language we all understand.
author: Stevie Wonder
